title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Judge Sullivan allows left-wing Watergate prosecutors to file briefs in Flynn case, smear Flynn for another news cycle, convince public Trump has corrupted DOJ. Former U.S. attorneys McCarthy, Tolman on Sullivan decision. Obama officials aren't worried about being unmasked. Brennan had information that Putin wanted Hillary to win, buried it. Ember coffee mug. Brennan hid information about Putin and Hillary, created phony narrative of Trump-Russia collusion. Brit Hume realizes the Trump-Russia hoax was worst journalistic scandal of his lifetime, and that it's ongoing now in coronavirus story. Why is Fauci the only expert we hear from? If they keep schools closed in the fall, many people won't be able to go back to work. There's good reason to expose what Obama did, even if he'll never be punished for it.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Obama won't be prosecutors, but underlings could be. Trump treated as a criminal since before he was elected. Effort to get rid of Trump continues though coronavirus. Dems want you to stay home, collect payments from gov't. Elections have consequences. Rush has no control over what DOJ or Republicans do, but he can educate America about liberalism. FISA reform won't happen. Barr and Durham are best hope we have. Caller says Trump should defund sanctuary cities. Fauci on vaccines. California university systems close for fall, broom standardized tests. LA County to stay shut down through summer. Axios: no increase of cases in most states that have reopened. How Trump should deal with Fauci.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Why Trump doesn't get rid of Fauci. Why Trump had to agree to initial lockdown. How Trump deals with Fauci now. Obama officials, including Biden, Clapper, Brennan, Power requested Flynn unmasking. Oregon caller on school shutdown. Restaurants in Washington to require contact information. CNN poll shows Biden losing in battlegrounds. Biden trapped in basement, dementia patients fear leaving home. Rush predicts Cuomo hijacking of Democrat Convention.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
